p: After minced, 5 g S. baicalensis was extracted with 100 ml of 70% ethanol in a 300 ml flask after sonication for 1 h at 25 °C. The solvent was filtrated and completely removed under reduced pressure at room temperature. The residue was freeze-dried overnight. The dried herbal residue was then dissolved completely to obtain a 100 mg/ml stock solution in DMSO which was stored at −20 °C before use.
